name: King Kobold
description: The King Kobold is a small humanoid with exceptional dexterity, capable of evading attacks and utilizing both melee weapons and spellcasting.
memorable: Its strategic use of Cunning Action and spellcasting makes it a dangerous foe in combat.
goals: To lead its kin in skirmishes and protect its territory with cunning tactics.
relations: Often found in groups with other kobolds, it may command lesser kobolds and allies in battle.
environment: Commonly found in underground lairs or cave systems, often in mountainous or hilly terrain.
strengths: Exceptional Dexterity (+5) allows it to be evasive; its spellcasting enhances its versatility in battle.
weaknesses: Sunlight Sensitivity causes disadvantage on attack rolls and Perception checks while in direct sunlight.
attacks: Attacks with shortswords and a hand crossbow, utilizing multiattack for additional damage.
most_powerful_ability: Evasion allows it to take no damage from certain area attacks, showcasing its high mobility.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see well in low light.
skills: Excels in deception, insight, intimidation, and persuasion, making it formidable in social interactions.
additional_information: Pack Tactics grants advantage on attacks with allies nearby.
Can use Sneak Attack for extra damage under favorable conditions.
4th-level spellcaster with a diverse spell selection.
Mage armor increases its AC to 18 for better protection.
Cunning Action enhances its mobility in combat.
spellcasting: 4th-level spellcaster with access to spells such as fire bolt, grease, and invisibility.
test_queries: cunning small spellcaster with ambush tactics
kobold leader with sneaky abilities and spells
tactical humanoid with high dexterity and intelligence
King Kobold with sunlight sensitivity and evasion
spellcasting monster with pack tactics and deception
